Reporting Requirements and Completion of Form FFP-4
No recurring report is required on fugitive felon cases.Â  However, ROs must respond to requests from CO for information about specific fugitive felon cases.
If
Form FFP-4, VA Feedback Form
, was attached to
Form FFP-3
,
complete
Form FFP-4
send an e-mail to
VAVBAWAS/CO/212
(VSCs/BESTs) or
VAVBAWAS/CO/P&F TNG QUAL OVRST
(PMCs) that requests the address to which the
Form FFP-4
should be sent, and
send the form by regular mail to the address Compensation Service or P&F Service provides in response to the e-mail.
Note
:
Form FFP-3
must remain in the claims folder.
